Slash.help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Hack.help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Throwing_Knives.help: You throw a sharpened dagger at your target.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Savage_Slice.help: You perform a powerful maneuver that deals a great amount of damage and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Savage_Strike.help: You perform a devastating attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce its defense.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Sirens_Song.help: You send forth a deadly song which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Fearsome_Stare.help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.
Fearsome_Stare.targetHelp: You are terrified and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Petrifying_Gaze.help: Your target is turned to stone by your gaze.
